about_the_game: Enjoy the unique sound of feudal Japan. Relive both the excitement and the tranquil atmosphere of Sengoku Dynasty with this diverse and eclectic mix of original compositions from Elina Ungarova (Medieval Dynasty, Far Cry 5) for the engrossing genre-blend Sengoku Dynasty. The OST contains 12 tracks.
detailed_description: Enjoy the unique sound of feudal Japan. Relive both the excitement and the tranquil atmosphere of Sengoku Dynasty with this diverse and eclectic mix of original compositions from Elina Ungarova (Medieval Dynasty, Far Cry 5) for the engrossing genre-blend Sengoku Dynasty. The OST contains 12 tracks.

name: Sengoku Dynasty - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 180 MB available space

short_description: Enjoy the music of Sengoku Dynasty with this eclectic selection of tracks from the Original Soundtrack.
